## GroupedProductItem interface

GroupedProductItem contains information about an individual grouped product item

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GroupedProductItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [position?](./magento-api.groupedproductitem.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The relative position of this item compared to the other group items |
|  [product?](./magento-api.groupedproductitem.product.md) | Maybe&lt;[ProductInterface](./magento-api.productinterface.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ProductInterface object, which contains details about this product option |
|  [qty?](./magento-api.groupedproductitem.qty.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The quantity of this grouped product item |
